tool_description: Gives you a list of tricks for different kind of sports.
title: Tricklist

api_list.name: Get snowboard tricks
api_list.description: Get all snowboard tricks, stances and grabs with description.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tricklist.p.rapidapi.com/snowboard/tricks"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tricklist.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get longbaord tricks
api_list.description: Get all longboard tricks with link to video tutorial.
api_list.code:
